Title: Set Up RenPy Project Structure
Description: Initialize RenPy project with proper directory structure for scripts/images/audio. Setup Git repo and gitignore. Create test scene to verify project launches successfully.

Title: Implement Belief System Core Classes
Description: Create BeliefSystem Python class managing core/surface/on-mind beliefs. Implement methods: add_core_belief add_surface_belief set_on_mind clear_on_mind get_active_beliefs introspect. Support depth 1-3 introspection system.

Title: Implement Drug System Core Classes
Description: Create base Drug class with tolerance/timing. Implement Alcohol Cannabis AlcoholCannabis Antidepressant Antipsychotic classes. Each has apply_high and apply_comedown decorator methods. DrugManager handles combinations.

Title: Implement Reality Shift System
Description: Create reality shift system with 5 severity levels (catastrophic severe moderate minor harmony). Visual effects audio cues physical pain responses. Triggered by belief violations and drug use. Tracks reality_stability 0-10.

Title: Implement Introspection Mechanic
Description: Create introspect label that pauses game. Displays violated belief and The Critical Question. Offers interpretation choices that affect awareness. Options to apologize commit to change or continue harmful path. Stabilizes or worsens reality based on choice.

Title: Implement State Management & Save System
Description: Create player_state and npc_states dictionaries. Implement save/load with auto-save triggers. Support 10+ save slots with metadata. Ensure all state variables persist correctly.

Title: Implement Choice Tracking System
Description: Create choice_record structure tracking all major choices with metadata (character involved alignment consequences). Store immediate mid-term and revelation consequences. Query functions by character and alignment.

Title: Implement Belief-Action Alignment Checker
Description: Create check_belief_alignment label that calculates alignment score. Triggers positive feelings if aligned or reality shift if misaligned. Severity based on degree of violation. Can trigger harmony state.

Title: Implement NPC Belief System & Reaction Engine
Description: NPCs have own BeliefSystem instances. Calculate emotional responses based on player actions vs NPC beliefs. Trust modified by alignment. Dialogue filtered by beliefs. NPCs can have beliefs reinforced or challenged based on openness stat.

Title: Implement Forgiveness System
Description: Calculate forgiveness eligibility based on trauma_healing witnessed_change player_awareness genuine_remorse. Create forgiveness_scene template with boundary setting. One-chance-only system. Accepting unlocks redemption path.

Title: Create Character Definition System
Description: Define all 13 characters in RenPy with character objects and color coding. Setup image tags (placeholder images ok). Test each character can speak dialogue with correct name display.

Title: Implement Group Therapy Session System
Description: Create group_therapy_session label. Exactly 3 introspections per session. Player can volunteer or observe. NPCs volunteer based on AI. Depth increases over time. Track witnesses and calculate reactions. Unlock dialogue based on shares. Reference previous sessions. Track group reputation.

Title: Write Chapter 1 Complete Dialogue
Description: Write complete Chapter 1 script (3000+ words). Opening wake scene with amnesia. Dramatic reality shifts (giraffe jungle underwater void). Name input. Nurse Reyes and Dr Chen introductions. Choices affect panic and awareness. Subtle suicide foreshadowing.

Title: Create Chapter 1 Placeholder Art
Description: Create placeholder images for Chapter 1. Hospital room normal and shift variants (jungle underwater void evening night). Nurse Reyes sprites (normal giraffe mermaid subtle variants). Dr Chen sprites. Introspection space. Proper resolution and compression.

Title: Implement Chapter 1 Reality Shift Sequences
Description: Implement dramatic shift sequences with flash transitions screen effects audio glitches pauses. First shift hospital to jungle. Second shift jungle to underwater. Third shift underwater to stable. Player reactions. Panic increases awareness can increase. Stability gradually improves.

Title: Create Chapter 1 Audio Assets
Description: Source or create audio for Chapter 1. Heartbeat monitor loop. Reality glitch harsh and soft. Hospital ambience. Door open. Soft harmonic. Background music ambient unsettling. All in ogg format with balanced levels.

Title: Implement Player Name Input & State Initialization
Description: Name input prompt at correct moment. Custom name or default Alex. Name used in dialogue. Initialize all player_state variables (awareness panic reality_stability core_beliefs etc). Set name_chosen flag.

Title: Implement Chapter 1 Endings & Transitions
Description: Final scene player alone at night. Introspective narration. Hint at suicide question. Peaceful shift with stars. Fade to black. Optional end chapter title. Smooth transition to Chapter 2. Auto-save triggers.

Title: Chapter 1 Playtesting & Iteration
Description: Minimum 3 playtesters complete Chapter 1. Gather feedback on pacing clarity emotional impact technical issues. Document and prioritize issues. Fix typos adjust pacing. Re-test after changes.

Title: Design Therapy Scenario Questions
Description: Design 10-15 hypothetical scenarios covering belief pairs (Honesty vs Kindness Self-Sacrifice vs Self-Preservation Justice vs Mercy Control vs Surrender etc). Each has 3-4 choices with belief values. Dr Chen follow-up dialogue. No obviously right answers. Emotionally engaging.

Title: Implement Therapy Session 1 (One-on-One)
Description: Create therapy_session_1 label. Therapy room background and Dr Chen sprite. Introduction to belief-building. Present 5+ scenarios. Player choices populate core_beliefs with strengths 1-10. Dr Chen reflects choices. Visual demonstration of reality stabilizing. Stability increases to 3-4.

Title: Implement Group Therapy Sessions (Weeks 1-2)
Description: Create 3-4 early group sessions. All 4 patients attend. Dr Chen facilitates. 3 introspections per session. Week 1 surface topics (why here what anxious about). Player volunteers or observes. NPC volunteer logic. Witness reactions stored. Group reputation tracked. Characters reference previous shares.

Title: Write Character Background Shares (Progressive Revelation)
Description: Write 5-week progression for each character (Becky Maria Jasmine Jill). Week 1 surface week 5 deep. Each share has emotional authenticity appropriate depth witness reaction potential callback opportunities. Dr Chen facilitation responses.

Title: Implement Group Therapy Sessions (Weeks 3-5)
Description: Create weeks 3-5 sessions (9 total). Topics deepen: week 3 origins week 4 core trauma week 5 deep vulnerability. Player can share own struggles (polygamy guilt). Group reactions affect relationships. Major revelations unlock private dialogue. Characters reference group in 1-on-1. Trust affected. Callback system working.

Title: Implement Witness Reaction & Belief Change System
Description: Create process_witness_reaction function. Calculate for each witness: alignment with beliefs openness to new perspectives trust/relationship effect. If aligned belief reinforced trust increases. If challenging and open consider new perspective growth. If challenging and closed defensive trust decreases. Unlock dialogue based on reactions.

Title: Create Therapy Room & Group Room Backgrounds
Description: Create one-on-one therapy room (professional warm couch chairs desk diplomas plants clear and distorted versions). Group therapy room (circle of chairs institutional comfortable multiple positions natural lighting). Both in day and evening. Placeholder quality acceptable.

Title: Implement Medication Choice Scene
Description: Scene at end Chapter 2. Dr Chen explains facility policy need stabilization medication helps shifts but affects introspection. Choice: accept (faster release limited introspection) or refuse (stay longer full healing access). Choice affects on_medication and release_timeline. If accepted drug system activates antidepressants.

Title: Implement Detective Rivera First Interview
Description: Scene in Chapter 3. Detective sprite. Professional probing dialogue. Questions about memories enemies conflicts relationship history. Player answers honestly or evasively. Detective takes notes subtle suspicion. Foreshadowing. Guilt about partner subtly shown. Sets up investigation subplot.

Title: Create Chapter 2-3 Transitions & Pacing
Description: Time passage indicators (three days later after another week). Variation between sessions not repetitive. Some sessions summarized. Important sessions in full. Downtime between sessions. Can explore facility talk to characters. Pacing natural not rushed. Clear progression week-to-week.

Title: Chapters 2-3 Playtesting & Iteration
Description: Minimum 3 playtesters complete Chapters 2-3. Feedback on belief system clarity group therapy engagement character authenticity choice meaningfulness mechanic confusion. Document prioritize issues. Adjust pacing trim repetitive elements add variety. Re-test after changes.

Title: Write Becky Complete Character Arc (Chapter 4)
Description: Write complete Becky arc (5000+ words). Good path: support loyalty process attachment build self-worth healing. Evil path: plant doubt intercept letters seduce exploit. Private conversations reference group. Self-harm trigger warnings sensitive handling. 10+ major choices. Test both paths.

Title: Write Maria Complete Character Arc (Chapter 5)
Description: Write complete Maria arc (5000+ words). Good path: support withdrawals process survivor guilt confront pattern sobriety kidney donation. Evil path: supply alcohol use intoxication hide Carlos info keep dependent. Withdrawal realistic intense. Relapse possible. Carlos introduction. Addiction authentic not glamorized.

Title: Write Jasmine Complete Character Arc (Chapter 6)
Description: Write complete Jasmine arc (5000+ words). Good path: sit withdrawals learn Lily help say name support trauma therapy Daniel Marcus reunion. Evil path: supply drugs exploit hide settlement Marcus traumatized. Withdrawal medical accuracy. Overdose scene (survives). Grief processing. Sensitive child death handling.

Title: Write Jill Complete Character Arc (Chapter 7)
Description: Write complete Jill arc (5000+ words). Good path: recognize trauma decline propositions process consent build worth Sophie reunion. Evil path: sleep with her use trauma frame as therapy reinforce harm. CSA never shown only discussed. Sophie testimony abuser imprisoned. REQUIRES sensitivity reader before implementation.

Title: Implement Evil Act Tracking & Consequences
Description: Populate evil_acts array with character harmed type severity chapter hidden consequences. Evil acts trigger reality shift introspection trust decrease relationship damage. Store consequences (Becky father death Maria Carlos failure Jasmine Marcus trauma Jill Sophie healing). Evil path flag if 5+ acts.

Title: Implement Good Path Rewards & Relationship Building
Description: Trust system increases with good choices. Relationship milestones (friendship 5 close 7 deep trust 9 romance possible 9+attraction). Each milestone unlocks dialogue deeper conversations affection romance scenes. Characters thank player. Reality stability increases. Helper's high reinforcement. Good path flag.

Title: Create NSFW Scenes (Good Path)
Description: Romance scenes for 4 patients good path. Requires trust 9+ mutual attraction no exploitation genuine connection. Content: emotionally intimate mutual vulnerability celebration of healing consensual enthusiastic character-specific. Proper age gates warnings. Player can decline without breaking relationship.

Title: Create NSFW Scenes (Evil Path)
Description: Exploitation scenes for 4 patients evil path. Content: hollow mechanical power imbalance character dissociated player empty after questionable consent no intimacy. Trigger shame reality shift relationship damage. Player can back out (redemption possible). Proper warnings.

Title: Implement Polygamy/Honesty System
Description: Player pursues multiple relationships. Dialogue option appears to reveal others. Honesty path: discuss polyamory some accept some don't boundaries trust maintained ethical non-monogamy. Dishonesty: characters discover massive betrayal severe shift relationships destroyed feeds evil path. Group therapy guilt scene.

Title: Create Character-Specific Backgrounds & Sprites
Description: Character sprites all expressions: Becky (neutral happy sad anxious crying intimate) Maria (neutral professional drunk withdrawing happy intimate) Jasmine (neutral exhausted high sober grieving intimate) Jill (neutral defensive sexual vulnerable healing intimate) Dr Chen Nurse Reyes Detective. Personal room backgrounds. ComfyUI best consistency. Reality stability variants.

Title: Write Chapter 8 - Convergence
Description: Chapter 8 (4000+ words) storylines intersect. Detective intensifies. Watcher appearances increase. Flashback fragments. Player questions who was I before. Reality shifts based on path (good stable evil chaos). Foreshadowing: why can't I remember who shot me what if I know. Build tension.

Title: Write Chapter 9 - The Revelation
Description: Revelation sequence (5000+ words). Memory flood: past predatory behavior realizing pattern self-awareness horror suicide decision (not shown revealed) waking second chance. Parallel current behavior: good chose differently evil repeated pattern. Detective reveals findings. Reality shift catastrophic or perfect clarity. Watcher final pre-resolution. Extremely emotional.

Title: Write Chapter 10 - Good Path Consequences
Description: Good path outcomes (6000+ words). Marcus Becky reunion. Daniel Marcus(son) Jasmine. Carlos Maria. Sophie Jill abuser imprisoned. Each reunion: emotional authentic thanks ripple effect celebrates growth. Patient outcomes thriving. Player broke cycle can forgive self can forgive original abuser. Genuinely uplifting.

Title: Write Chapter 10 - Evil Path Consequences
Description: Evil path devastating consequences (6000+ words). Marcus truth letters. Becky father died suicide attempt (survives). Carlos dying Maria could have saved. Daniel Marcus traumatized. Sophie confronts you're no different. Each scene: devastating not gratuitous shows cost characters break or forgive player sees self as monster. Detective arrests. Reality unstable. Player alone.

Title: Write Forgiveness Scenes (Evil Path Redemption)
Description: Forgiveness scenes each character if requirements met (4000+ words). Based on template. Each: acknowledge harm explain forgiveness for their healing boundaries can you forgive who hurt you redemption offer. Player accept or reject. Accepting begins redemption arc reality stabilizes. Dr Chen final teaching. Powerful not preachy.

Title: Write Chapter 11 - Good Path Epilogues
Description: Multiple ending variations (1500-2000 words each). Endings for Becky Maria Jasmine Jill Dr Chen Nurse Reyes Polyamory Solo. Each: time jump months/year montage thriving player new purpose Watcher fully formed smiling final message breaking cycles. Satisfying and earned. Credits integration.

Title: Write Chapter 11 - Evil Path Ending
Description: Evil path ending (2000+ words). Player psych ward or prison. Alone reality unstable. Montage destroyed lives. Watcher fades crying. Dr Chen final visit: second chance same pattern but even now could heal do you want to. Choice: try again (NG+) or give up (game over). Final message about choice. Credits somber. Impactful offers hope.

Title: Implement The Watcher System
Description: Watcher sprite: young boy 8-12 light/shadow ethereal. Multiple states bright dim fading crying smiling. Appears only: major moral choices introspection severe shifts revelation epilogue. Never NSFW. Brightness based on alignment. No dialogue until final. Good: fully formed speaks smiles. Evil: fades tear.

Title: Implement Male Support Characters
Description: Character definitions sprites for Marcus Daniel Carlos. Marcus dialogue: good grateful loving / evil forgiving fury. Daniel: good thanks / evil grace anger. Carlos: good recovery gratitude / evil dying forgiving devastating. Models healthy masculinity.

Title: Create Ending Cinematics & Credits
Description: Good path montages (characters thriving time passage happiness). Evil path montages (consequences somber emptiness). Credits: contributors mental health resources disclaimer crisis hotlines. Music for each ending. The End or Try Again screens.

Title: Create All Character Portraits (Final Art Pass)
Description: All 13 characters full expression sets. Best ComfyUI consistency. Reality shift variants. NSFW variants for romance. Estimated 150+ images. Consistent style. 1080p minimum. Compressed. Organized folders.

Title: Create All Background Art (Final Art Pass)
Description: Hospital therapy group assisted living patient bedrooms player outdoor introspection detective ending backgrounds. Reality shift variants. Day/evening/night as needed. Estimated 50+ backgrounds.

Title: Create Visual Effects for Reality Shifts
Description: Catastrophic: screen break impossible geometry void particles. Severe: distortion waves color inversion transformations. Moderate: flicker shimmer color shift. Minor: brief glitch subtle changes. Harmony: clarity glow vibrant saturation. Image overlays or RenPy transforms.

Title: Compose Main Theme & Chapter Themes
Description: Main menu mysterious melancholic. Chapter 1 unsettling medical. Therapy calm introspective. Good path hopeful warm. Evil path dark tense. Romance intimate emotional. Revelation dramatic intense. Good ending uplifting. Evil ending somber heavy. All loopable 3-5min OGG balanced.

Title: Create Sound Effects Library
Description: Reality shift sounds all severities. Heartbeat monitor. Hospital ambience. Door footsteps. UI sounds. Phone notification. Harmony chime. Brain zap. Ambient rain birds. OGG normalized.

Title: Create UI Graphics & Custom Screens
Description: Custom dialogue box choice menu. Introspection screen UI. Group therapy seating chart visual. Belief system display. Drug effects status. Reality stability indicator. Optional relationship meters. Save/load settings main menu graphics. Match aesthetic.

Title: Implement Comprehensive Save/Load Testing
Description: Test save/load every chapter. Test during dialogue choices shifts introspection drug effects NSFW. Verify all state saves/loads. Multiple slots. Corruption handling. Auto-save. Document save-breaking changes. Fix critical bugs.

Title: Full QA Pass - Good Path
Description: Full good path playthrough start to credits (4000+ words). Test all choice variations. Document bugs typos pacing unclear moments. Verify outcomes male characters romance endings. Minimum 3 playthroughs. Fix all critical bugs.

Title: Full QA Pass - Evil Path
Description: Full evil path playthrough. Test evil variations. Document bugs. Verify consequences reality degradation evil ending forgiveness redemption. Minimum 3 playthroughs. Fix critical bugs.

Title: Writing Polish Pass
Description: Proofread entire script. Fix typos grammar. Verify character voice. Improve unclear tighten wordy enhance emotional. Verify Critical Question consistency foreshadowing. Check plot holes character arc consistency. Professional editor if budget. Second proofread.

Title: Sensitivity Reader Review
Description: Mental health professional reviews therapy introspection drugs suicide trauma. CSA survivor reviews Jill. Addiction specialist reviews Maria Jasmine. Self-harm expertise reviews Becky. Document feedback address critical update warnings update resources.

Title: Performance Optimization
Description: Image loading optimization preload lazy NSFW compression. Audio optimization looping normalization format. Script optimization remove redundant optimize checks clean unused. Test minimum spec. 60fps dialogue. Load under 5sec save under 2sec.

Title: Accessibility Features
Description: Text size options. Font options. High contrast. Basic screen reader. Colorblind mode. Skip options NSFW triggers shifts. Content warning customization. Auto-advance. Test accessibility tools.

Title: Create Marketing Materials
Description: Trailer 2-3min (concept gameplay uniqueness warnings music VO). 20+ screenshots variety. Marketing copy: short 100w long 500w features taglines. Key art cover logo. Test with target audience.

Title: Steam Page Setup
Description: Steam Partner account. App registered. Store page: title subtitle descriptions features requirements age rating warnings screenshots trailer key art. Tags price release date. Review build. Test page visible looks good.

Title: Itch.io Page Setup
Description: Account created. Game page description screenshots trailer. Pricing or free demo. Tags warnings. Download builds. Test page downloads.

Title: Patreon Setup & Community Building
Description: Account created. Tiers: 5 updates 10 early access 25 input credits. Description rewards fulfillment schedule. Optional Discord. First post. Link from game.

Title: Beta Testing Program
Description: Recruit 10-20 diverse testers. Distribute builds. Feedback survey: technical pacing story clarity emotional impact therapeutic value recommend improvements. Compile prioritize fix re-test thank testers credit.

Title: Launch Day Preparation
Description: Final builds all platforms. Test final. Upload Steam Itch. Review approve pages. Press kit. Launch announcement. Schedule social. Support email. FAQ. Backup plan. Team ready.

Title: Post-Launch Support & Monitoring
Description: Monitor Steam Itch forums reviews comments. Support email 24hr. Track bugs prioritize critical. Patches. Engage community. Thank reviewers. Collect suggestions. Plan DLC roadmap. Celebrate!

Title: Character Belief System - Becky
Description: Populate Becky belief system JSON. 5-7 core beliefs 2-3 trauma beliefs 3-5 surface beliefs. Hierarchy healing progression. All fields: statement strength origin triggers emotional signature behavior pattern.

Title: Character Belief System - Maria
Description: Same as 71 for Maria.

Title: Character Belief System - Jasmine
Description: Same as 71 for Jasmine.

Title: Character Belief System - Jill
Description: Same as 71 for Jill.

Title: Character Belief System - Dr Chen
Description: Same as 71 for Dr Chen.

Title: Character Belief System - Nurse Reyes
Description: Same as 71 for Nurse Reyes.

Title: Character Belief System - Detective Rivera
Description: Same as 71 for Detective Rivera.

Title: Character Belief System - Marcus
Description: Same as 71 for Marcus.

Title: Character Belief System - Daniel
Description: Same as 71 for Daniel.

Title: Character Belief System - Carlos
Description: Same as 71 for Carlos.

Title: New Game+ Implementation
Description: Option after evil path. Player starts over retaining awareness knowledge belief mechanics memory of previous life. Special dialogue acknowledging second chance. Achievement for NG+ good path.

Title: Achievement System
Description: Define 20-30 achievements: complete paths help/destroy all perfect introspection max stability find all secrets ethical polyamory NG+ etc. Steam achievements. In-game pop-ups.

Title: Analytics & Metrics (Optional)
Description: Opt-in only ask permission. Track anonymized: paths chosen quit points playtime choice distribution. No PII. Privacy policy. Can disable. Data improves game.

Title: Write Dr Chen Progressive Group Therapy Shares
Description: Write Dr Chen's 6-week progression sharing her trauma in group therapy. Week 1-2 professional no sharing. Week 3 mentions working through something difficult. Week 4 reveals she was sexually assaulted several months ago. Week 5 discusses learning to forgive her attacker. Week 6+ models forgiveness work. Never reveals player is attacker. Extremely sensitive writing required.

Title: Write Player Rape Memory Dream Sequence (Good Path)
Description: Write dream sequence where player remembers the rape without seeing victim's face. Drunk/high. Woman saying no/stop. Not stopping. Horror of realization. Running home. The gun. Wakes in cold sweat. Doesn't remember WHO but remembers WHAT. Introspection: what did I do did someone shoot me did I deserve it. NOT GRAPHIC. Focus on horror and realization not assault details. REQUIRES multiple sensitivity readers.

Title: Implement Player Confession System (Good Path)
Description: After dream player can choose: confess in group therapy without knowing victim / tell Dr Chen privately in session / keep secret (damages good path). If confesses publicly group reacts. Each female patient decides forgive or reject based on: trauma history how player treated them redemption beliefs healing progress. Dr Chen maintains composure. Track all reactions.

Title: Write Dr Chen Private Revelation Scene (Good Path)
Description: After player confesses (not knowing) Dr Chen requests private session. Reveals she is the woman he raped. Explains why she offered to treat him: testing if people can truly change believing in redemption her own forgiveness work. THE MOMENT - Player broken: How can I ever forgive myself for what I did? Dr Chen: Because I forgive you. Her choice offers grace doesn't erase what happened but offers path forward. Player can accept or reject. Offers choice: continue treatment with her or transfer. Requires extraordinary sensitivity. Her agency and strength paramount.

Title: Write Dr Chen Public Revelation Scene (Evil Path)
Description: Player has been exploiting patients repeating pattern. Dr Chen realizes and reveals in group: I need to tell you something about why player is really here. Reveals the rape. Reveals she offered to treat him. Reveals he's exploiting second chance. Female patients react horror/betrayal. Some realize re-traumatized by rapist. Dr Chen's trauma triggered but maintains strength. Leads to Chapter 10 evil consequences. NOT victim-blaming. Her strength clear.

Title: Implement Female Patient Forgiveness Calculations (Post-Rape Reveal)
Description: After rape revelation each female patient calculates forgiveness based on belief systems. Factors: their own sexual trauma history how player treated them current healing state beliefs about redemption male violence beliefs about change possibility. Some forgive conditionally some reject some need time. Each reaction authentic to character. Store decisions affect endings.

Title: Update Chapter 9 Revelation with Rape Memory
Description: Revise Chapter 9 revelation sequence. Memory returns in 3 stages: 1-The rape (drunk/high woman saying no not stopping horror). 2-Running home self-hatred gun decision. 3-Good path player confesses Dr Chen reveals / Evil path Dr Chen reveals to group. Reframes entire game: every session was her testing will he repeat or break pattern. Every interaction was rape victim treating rapist. Extremely heavy emotionally devastating.

Title: Update Good Path Endings with Rape Reconciliation
Description: Revise good path endings. If player confessed and female patients forgave: they acknowledge what he did recognize genuine change still set boundaries. Dr Chen can offer final session: I forgive you AND I will never forget what you did AND I believe you can be different. Player can pursue romance with patients who forgave (not Dr Chen - inappropriate). Ending acknowledges: you can't undo rape but you can choose differently going forward.

Title: Update Evil Path Ending with Rape Revelation Consequences
Description: Revise evil path ending. After public rape revelation: patients feel betrayed re-traumatized unsafe. Some patients breakdown worsen regress. Dr Chen despite everything still offers: you had a second chance extraordinary grace you chose to repeat I still believe change is possible but not with me not anymore. Detective arrests on original rape charge plus new exploitation. Player alone seeing gave up greatest gift possible. Devastating.

Title: Create Rape Survivor Sensitivity Reader Team
Description: Recruit 3-5 rape survivor sensitivity readers specifically for Dr Chen arc and revelation content. Provide content warnings for reviewers. Get feedback on: is this exploitative or therapeutic does it blame victim does it center Dr Chen's agency is player accountability clear is forgiveness portrayed correctly are triggers handled appropriately. Implement all critical feedback. Compensate readers appropriately.

Title: Update Content Warnings for Rape Plot
Description: Add prominent content warning: This game deals with protagonist who committed rape while intoxicated and is attempting to change. Narrative does not excuse behavior but examines if genuine transformation possible. May be extremely triggering for survivors. Add skip option for rape memory sequence and revelation scenes. Add resources for RAINN and sexual assault hotlines. Make warnings impossible to miss.

Title: Write Dr Chen Belief System (Rape Survivor)
Description: Populate Dr Chen belief system with focus on her trauma and forgiveness journey. Core beliefs about: redemption possibility human capacity for change her own strength/agency forgiveness as active choice not weakness boundaries with grace trauma doesn't define her. Trauma beliefs: trust is difficult men are capable of harm she deserves safety healing is ongoing choice to treat him was reclaiming power. Surface beliefs about therapy professional boundaries.
